name: Yakko's Basics in Zaniness and Learning!
name_original: Yakko's Basics in Zaniness and Learning!
description: Yakko's Basics in Zaniness and Learning is a modification of Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning even though I didn't support for the Kickstarter, I still love Baldi's Basics no matter what and I enjoyed making this mod for of course modification purposes. If you see something that's wrong in this mod and you want me to fix it, I can fix anything (not referencing Fix-it-Felix Jr from Wreck It Ralph)! If you're saying to yourself "Why is the intro The Addams Family 1992 intro? That is not related to Animaniacs." Basically that was stuck in my head and I needed to get it out of my head so I put it in just to catch you off guard ( I mean that metaphorically just to clarify). I promise in the next update for this mod I will include Yakko's World because that's a song that fits Yakko and fits Baldi's original plan besides math.
